channel.title: Neopet account recovery help
channel.description:
Hey guys I was wondering if anyone could help me with a problem
a long time ago I made the account reserectionofnewguy on neopets just so I could code some neopet game autos in scar and I loast interest after a while and quit working with it and since then unsubscribed from neopets mailing list, now I would like the account back to give to my young nephew because the account is loaded which brings me to my problem - they wont email me the password because im on their "don't email" me list, any suggestions on what I can do? I was thinking it would be great if I could get the hash for my account and locally bruteforce it but I don't know if its possible to get it
and yea my first account newguy45 was banned for autoing so hence reserectionofnewguy lol

item.title: Neopet account recovery help
item.dc:creator: @newguy45 newguy45
item.description:
@newguy45 wrote:

Hey guys I was wondering if anyone could help me with a problem

a long time ago I made the account reserectionofnewguy on neopets just so I could code some neopet game autos in scar and I loast interest after a while and quit working with it and since then unsubscribed from neopets mailing list, now I would like the account back to give to my young nephew because the account is loaded which brings me to my problem - they wont email me the password because im on their “don’t email” me list, any suggestions on what I can do?
